preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 900 g of iron using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 490 g of phosphorus carefully, ensuring to handle it in a fume hood or well-ventilated area due to its reactive nature. 
 3. Weigh 10 g each of scandium and zirconium. 
 4. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 5. Use a mechanical mixer for 15 minutes to ensure uniform distribution of all powders.
